committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill requiring consideration of the use of underground structures for public buildings whenever appropriate.

summary.text: Amends the Public Building Cooperative Use Act of 1976 to direct the Administrator of the General Services Administration to construct or acquire underground structures for use as public buildings unless the use of such structures is demonstrably inappropriate for the proposed function of such buildings.

titles.title: A bill requiring consideration of the use of underground structures for public buildings whenever appropriate.
